name: Death Spacing
description:
You will be playing as a space postman found himself around of bunch of asteroids. You need to get out and save you ship.

Be careful not to hit an asteroid, it will break your ship. Use panels on the ship to fix them when it needs to. Look for Hull (ship will explode when it became 0), Air (You will suffocate), Energy (Ship will not work when there is no energy), Fuel (ship will not move when Fuel is 0).

WASD to walk, Space to jump, E to use, 1-6 to change gravity (so you can reach out for other panels)
